cast.overview: In the poverty-stricken favelas of Rio de Janeiro in the 1970s, two young men choose different paths. Rocket is a budding photographer who documents the increasing drug-related violence of his neighborhood, while José “Zé” Pequeno is an ambitious drug dealer diving into a dangerous life of crime.
cast.title: City of God

details.biography: Graziella Moretto (Santos, May 15, 1972) is a Brazilian actress and author. She has received several awards throughout her career, including the Calunga Trophy for Best Actress at the Recife Festival, as well as receiving nominations for a Grande Otelo and a Guarani Award. Moretto has a degree in Performing Arts from the renowned School of Dramatic Arts at the University of São Paulo. She is known for City of God (2002), Maids (2001) and Feliz Natal (2008).
details.name: Graziella Moretto
